raw_comment:
What do you notice? 

I noticed that oil, Hydroelectric and nuclear power stays the same, and the wind and solar rise up.


What do you wonder? 

I wonder how they do these calculations, how do they know?



How does this relate to  you and your community? 

This can effect me and my community bc people are getting more cars and it can effect my health. 


Headline 

Are we Gassed up?
ace_sentences: I wonder how they do these calculations.
I wonder how they know the results.
This situation can affect my community.
People in my community get more cars.
More cars can affect my health.
The headline is: Are we gassed up?
